home.title: That idea keeping you up at night
home.titleLine2: Finally ready to see the light
home.description: Don't let great ideas rot in your head.
home.descriptionLine2: 3 minutes. Give it a proper home.
home.ideaInputDescription: Describe your product idea in a few sentences, and AI will turn it into a complete product page
home.ideaPlaceholder: e.g., A tool that helps developers quickly find code snippets...
home.exampleDescription: Choose an example idea, or type your own creative idea directly
home.exampleHint: ðŸ’¡ Click any example idea to get started, or type your own creative idea above

dev-tool.title: Code Snippet Manager
dev-tool.description: A tool that helps developers quickly find, save, and share code snippets

parenting-app.title: Baby Growth Tracker
parenting-app.description: A mobile app that helps new parents record baby milestones, vaccinations, and daily care

sleep-tracker.title: Smart Sleep Tracker
sleep-tracker.description: A health app that analyzes sleep patterns through AI and provides personalized sleep improvement suggestions

social-community.title: Interest-Based Social Platform
social-community.description: Connect users with shared hobbies to create in-depth vertical communities

ecommerce-helper.title: E-commerce Price Comparison Assistant
ecommerce-helper.description: Help consumers find the best prices with authentic guarantees and smart recommendations

content-creator.title: Content Creation Assistant
content-creator.description: AI-assisted full-process tool for content creators to select topics, write, and distribute

home.feature1Title: Strike while the iron is hot
home.feature1Description: Good ideas don't wait. Give it a dignified start now
home.feature2Title: It understands what you want to say
home.feature2Description: No need to rack your brain for words. AI helps you express yourself beautifully
home.feature3Description: One link is enough. Send it to friends, investors, or the family who always supports you
home.footer: Â© 2024 FirstDraft. Turn your first idea into something real.

default.question: Who is this product mainly for?
default.placeholder: Describe your target user group, the more specific the better...
default.example: Recent graduates entering the workforce, people with specific needs in a vertical market, ordinary people trying to solve a certain problem

default.question: What specific problem or pain point are they currently facing?
default.placeholder: Describe the difficult scenarios users currently encounter...
default.example: Existing solutions are too complex or expensive, lacking this tool makes work inefficient, manual operations are prone to errors

default.question: How does your product uniquely solve this problem?
default.placeholder: Explain your solution and differentiated value...
default.example: AI automates the processing, simpler and cheaper than competitors, deeply optimized for specific scenarios

dev-tool.question: What kind of developers does your tool mainly serve?
dev-tool.placeholder: Describe the type of developers and work scenarios...
dev-tool.example: Frontend engineers who frequently reuse code, programming beginners, tech leads managing multiple projects

dev-tool.question: What troubles do they most often encounter when writing or managing code?
dev-tool.placeholder: Describe specific pain points in the development workflow...
dev-tool.example: Can't find previously written code snippets, reinventing the wheel within the team, copying and pasting code between projects is error-prone

dev-tool.question: How does your product make code management and reuse more efficient?
dev-tool.placeholder: Explain core functionality and developer experience advantages...
dev-tool.example: One-click save and search code snippets, support for multiple languages and IDE integrations, team-shared code library to avoid duplicate development

parenting.question: What kind of parents does your app mainly help?
parenting.placeholder: Describe the characteristics of the target parent group...
parenting.example: New moms with 0-3 year olds, working mothers with a second child, families where grandparents help with childcare

parenting.question: What difficulties do these parents encounter when recording their baby's growth?
parenting.placeholder: Describe specific pain points in parenting records...
parenting.example: Photos scattered across various albums are hard to organize, can't remember vaccination schedules, miss milestones like baby's first rollover

parenting.question: How does your product make parenting records easy and meaningful?
parenting.placeholder: Explain core functionality and emotional value...
parenting.example: Automatically generate growth timelines, smart reminders for vaccines and checkups, one-click generation of growth albums to share with family

health.question: What kind of users does your sleep app mainly help?
health.placeholder: Describe the target user's sleep issues...
health.example: Office workers who want to understand sleep quality, people with sleep disorders who need monitoring, health enthusiasts who want to improve routines through data

health.question: What difficulties do they encounter when trying to understand or improve their sleep?
health.placeholder: Describe specific problems with sleep monitoring or improvement...
health.example: Don't know their sleep quality, manual sleep recording is too troublesome, don't understand sleep data and don't know how to improve

health.question: How does your product help them better understand and improve their sleep?
health.placeholder: Explain monitoring methods and personalized suggestions...
health.example: Automatic sleep cycle monitoring without manual recording, AI analysis of sleep data with improvement suggestions, smart reminders for optimal bedtime based on sleep patterns
